‡ National team caps and goals, correct as of 18:22, 17 June 2015 (UTC)
Ugo Njoku (amụrụ na 27 Nọvemba 1994, na Naijiria) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ na-agbachitere Croix Savoie Ambilly na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria.
Ugo Njoku gbara na Rivers Angels na Nigerian Women's Championship site na 2013 ruo 2017, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara Croix Savoie Ambilly.

Njoku nwere ọrụ mba ụwa mbụ ya na 2014 mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Naijiria na 2014 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup match megide Namibia. Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị mmeri na 2014 African Women's Championship.
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, a kpọrọ Njoku ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ maka otu Naijiria na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup.

N'oge 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup Group Match vs Australia Njoku gburu onye egwuregwu Australia Sam Kerr n'ihu. Omume Njoku, nke a kọwara dị ka otu n'ime omume ime ihe ike kachasị njọ a hụrụ na egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike ịkpata akpa dị ogologo maka onye ọkpụkpọ Naijiria. Njoku mechara kwụsị maka egwuregwu asọmpi atọ site na kọmitii ịdọ aka ná ntị, n'ụzọ dị irè na-achụpụ ya maka ihe fọdụrụ na asọmpi ahụ.
